alert.note: Alert for Animas River Basin; Four Corners, Upper Dolores River (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 04 at 5:36PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Montezuma County through 615 PM MDT... At 536 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 20 miles south of Mancos, or 24 miles northeast of Shiprock, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Montezuma County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Animas River Basin; Four Corners, Upper Dolores River
